info.name: Context Chat Backend
info.description:
This is the Python backend for Context Chat. Context Chat is useful for people who want to ask questions from a large language model but using their documents as context.
Three mandatory apps are required for this app to work (can be installed from the Apps page): - AppAPI: https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/app_api - Context Chat: https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/context_chat - Assistant: https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/assistant (The OCS API or the `occ` commands can also be used to interact with this app but it recommended to do that through a Text Processing OCP API consumer like the Assitant app.)
This app then should be installed from the "External Apps" page.
info.author: Anupam Kumar
